page.title: 07 Trade.
page.content: {The Travel Agent.} We visited Prestbury Travel Agent's. During half an hour there were two phone enquiries about hotels and flights.The agent said that the most popular holiday resorts were in Greece and Portugal.The most popular holidays in Britain are coach tours.The average number of customers in a day is 15 and in a week 90.There were 2 special offers available,a trip down the Nile and a cruise on the liner QE2. {The Village Post Office. } Stan Pearson runs Prestbury Village Post Office.He has owned it for 23 years and lives above it.He played football from 1935-1954.He enjoyed his career and never got sent off or gave away a penalty.He played for Manchester United and he also played at Wembley.
